message: There is no Vcore.....R7402 check?

title: [SOLVED]820-2936 no display
message:
r7402 bad replaced now activity on harddrive, no backlight no display no backlight

replaced fuse F9700 bad, i have pin 1, 2 12.56V

PPBUS_SW_LCDBKLT_PWR 0V may be bad Q9706 or Q9707 ?

R9789 146.8K R9788 302K

Q9706 pin 4 and 3 12,56V and pin 1265 0.4V probably bad ?

title: [SOLVED]820-2936 no display
message:
Vcore was missing, you replaced bad R7402, can you confirm if vcore is back now?

Let assume you have vcore since you mentionned having hdd activity:
What caused F9700 to go bad? There was a short on this line, or just the fuse was looking bad?

If the gate pin 3 of Q9706 is not lower than pin 4, Q9706 will not grant access to 12,56v from pin 4 to pin 1,2,5 and 6.

Pin 4 may not be lower than pin 3 for several reasons.

title: [SOLVED]820-2936 no display
message: Is there chime? LCD not recognized, first need image then can fix backlight if needed. Check with known good LCD, inspect connector/cable. Check 3V to L9008.

title: [SOLVED]820-2936 no display
message:
Pin 4 should be 3v3. You have 0.007.
Check if L9008 is not open. Maybe the a1342 lvds cable shorted this pin...
Check also any burnt trace or burned pins on/around lvds connector.

title: [SOLVED]820-2936 no display
message: Do you have a white screen with backlight or a dark screen with backlight? Check all LVDS lines on diode mode, LCD not connected of course.
